EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: 20/12/2012 - Foundation Lunch Menu
EmailTemplate.subject: New Email Template
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}, A gentle reminder to please submit the lunch menu for Term 2 by the 21st December 2012. For parents who are new, you will only have to choose 1 option out of the 7 given. Please follow the link below for the menu:
Foundation Lunch Menu
Regards,
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
